mapper.insert: insert into users(usersid , username , password , realname , sex , birthday , contact , address , image , role , status , regdate ) values(#{usersid} , #{username} , #{password} , #{realname} , #{sex} , #{birthday} , #{contact} , #{address} , #{image} , #{role} , #{status} , #{regdate} )
mapper.update: update users set username=#{username} , password=#{password} , realname=#{realname} , sex=#{sex} , birthday=#{birthday} , contact=#{contact} , address=#{address} , image=#{image} , role=#{role} , status=#{status} , regdate=#{regdate} where usersid=#{usersid}
mapper.select: select a.* from users a order by usersid desc
